authoringDecisions.rationale: Full-width hero with background image and overlay text requires complex styling. This is a clear block candidate per David's Model - an author wouldn't easily replicate this layout in Word/Docs.
Two-column layout with different content types (table vs text) requires structural block. Using Columns block provides clear authoring experience for side-by-side content.

leftColumn.rationale: Opening hours table with doctor name - structured tabular data is perfect for Table block

rightColumn.rationale: Services list, booking info, and staff details are simple text with headings and lists - perfect for default content authoring in Word/Docs
